name: Les Plague
description:
Les Plague is a Turn-Based RPG genre game with a Medieval theme. Tells the story of a doctor wearing thick red armor with the nickname Plague Doctor who wanders to heal residents of the attack of a disease spread by the mysterious lizard, Plagas.

Controller :

1 : Attack
2 : Defend

How To Play :

This is a turn-based game, each turn will be delayed 2 seconds before you can take action. The Player and the enemy have the same status each you play the game.
HP = 120
Attack = 12
Defend = 6

This game is just a prototype for testing in the game engine that is being developed
